Data Fields
EDMA_performanceConfig_t_ Struct Reference

EDMA performance configuration. More...

#include <drivers/edma/edma.h>

Data Fields

bool isConfigAllTransferControllers
 If set to true, configures all transfer controllers with specified configuration (transferControllerId is not relevant).
 
uint8_t transferControllerId
 If isConfigAllTransferControllers is false, then configures the transfer controller of this Id.
 
uint8_t transferControllerReadRate
 Read rate is used to specify using Read Rate Definitions the aggressiveness of read by the transfer controller, less cycles means more aggressive, see RDRATE in EDMA UG.
 
uint8_t queuePriority
 Queue priority, the defines EDMA_TPCC_QUEPRI_PRIQ0_PRIORITYX can be used here, where X is in the range [0,7], Note: 0 is highest priority and 7 is lowest. Refer to QUEPRI in EDMA UG.
 

Detailed Description

EDMA performance configuration.
